```
  ✖ Provide alt text when using img, area, input type='image', and object elements.
```

```html
    <img src="foo" />
```
```
    ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

  ℹ Meaningful alternative text on elements helps users relying on screen readers to understand
    content's purpose within a page.
```

```
  ℹ Meaningful alternative text on elements helps users relying on screen readers to understand
    content's purpose within a page.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

✖ Found 1 problem

```

### `36: formatted`

```html
<area />

```
